mapper.sql: ID, FAMILY_NUMBER, OWNER_MOBILE, TRANSACTOR,TRANSACTOR_ID_CARD, TRANSACTOR_MOBILE, APPLY_REASON, ID_CARD_IMAGE, TRANSACTOR_ID_CARD_IMAGE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG
mapper.insert: insert into t_cancel_water_meter (FAMILY_NUMBER, OWNER_MOBILE, TRANSACTOR, TRANSACTOR_ID_CARD,TRANSACTOR_MOBILE, APPLY_REASON, ID_CARD_IMAGE, TRANSACTOR_ID_CARD_IMAGE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG) values (#{familyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{transactorIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transactorMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transactorIdCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),now(), #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,0)
mapper.select: select FAMILY_NUMBER,TRANSACTOR,TRANSACTOR_MOBILE,OWNER_MOBILE from t_cancel_water_meter where OWNER_MOBILE = #{ownerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG = 0
